T

Textile - class net.sf.textile4j.Textile.
Textile Java implementation of Textism's Textile Humane Web Text Generator

For Origional PHP see http://www.textism.com/tools/textile

JTextile is another java implementation compatible with older (ie 1.3) versions of the JDK, and uses GNU-REGEX for the expressions See http://pipthepixie.tripod.com/code/jtextile.html
